results.title: Simvastatin and ROCK Inhibitor Y-27632 Inhibit Myofibroblast Differentiation of Graves' Ophthalmopathy-Derived Orbital Fibroblasts via RhoA-Mediated ERK and p38 Signaling Pathways
results.text_hl: Our results provided in vitro evidence of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@-mediated antifibrotic effects in @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Ophthalmopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049970 @@@GO@@@ that may also explain the possible protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ against the development of @<m>DISEASE_Graves_Ophthalmopathy</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D049970 @@@GO@@@.
